about_the_game:
Support us with this support pack helping us to create more content for the game and you get all cars unlocked.
In the future more cars will be added to the game and with this dlc you get all cars unlocked.
After purchase you need to enable this DLC from the steam client in order to take effect.
You wont lose any save games or in game progress if you activate the DLC.
If you want to roll back to unlock cars with point and its point before activating the DLC, just deactivate the DLC from the Steam Client.
detailed_description:
Support us with this support pack helping us to create more content for the game and you get all cars unlocked.
In the future more cars will be added to the game and with this dlc you get all cars unlocked.
After purchase you need to enable this DLC from the steam client in order to take effect.
You wont lose any save games or in game progress if you activate the DLC.
If you want to roll back to unlock cars with point and its point before activating the DLC, just deactivate the DLC from the Steam Client.
